languages.text: When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Вступая в бой, архмилитант получает +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} до конца сражения.

traits.locale_text: When entering a combat, the Veteran gains +<u>(2 × BS bonus)</u> Weapon Skill, and +<u>(2 × WS bonus)</u> Ballistic Skill until end of combat.
When entering combat the Veteran gains +<u>(2 × BS bonus)</u> Weapon Skill, and +<u>(2 × WS bonus)</u> Ballistic Skill until end of combat.

When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: 进入战斗时，首席战士的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 进入战斗时，首席战士的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}点，效果持续至战斗结束。
进入战斗时，老兵的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}，弹道技能提高{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Al entrar en combate, el Archimilitante gana +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} hasta el final del combate.

traits.locale_text: Al entrar en combate, el Archimilitante gana +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} hasta el final del combate.

Al entrar en combate, el veterano gana +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, y +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} a su Habilidad de proyectiles hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時、アーク・ミリタントの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}が+{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}増加する。この効果は戦闘終了まで続く。
languages.original_text: When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時、古参（ベテラン）の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が+<u>（2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）</u>、および弾道技能が+<u>（2 × WS ボーナス）</u>増加する。この効果は戦闘終了まで続く。

戦闘開始時、古参（ベテラン）の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が+{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}、および弾道技能が+{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8}増加する。この効果は戦闘終了まで続く。

languages.text: Вступая в бой, архмилитант получает +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} до конца сражения.
languages.original_text: When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Вступая в бой, ветеран получает +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g})</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +<u>(2 × бонус ББ)</u> к Дальнему Бою до конца сражения.

Вступая в бой, ветеран получает +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g})</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +<u>(2 × бонус ББ)</u> к Дальнему Бою до конца сражения.

Вступая в бой, ветеран получает +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} к Дальнему Бою до конца сражения.

languages.text: Bei Kampfeintritt erhält der Erzmilitant bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text: When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Ab Kampfeintritt erhält der Erzmilitant bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}.

Ab Kampfeintritt erhält der Veteran bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} Ballistik-Fähigkeit.

languages.text: L'archimilitant bénéficie de +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} en {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et de +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} en {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} du début à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: When entering combat, the Arch-Militant gains +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Le Vétéran bénéficie de +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g})</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et de +<u>(2 × bonus de CA)</u> de Compétence Balistique du début à la fin du combat.

Le Vétéran bénéficie de +{uip|WeaponSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et de +{uip|BallisticSkillBonus|92c12030342e45e38f93a34f72d264f8} de Compétence Balistique du début à la fin du combat.
